#summary Declaration of indexers.

= Indexer declaration =
The syntax to declare an indexer is specified by:
<pre>_
indexer-declaration:
    annotations,,opt,, property-modifiers,,opt,, type *this `[`* formal-parameter-list *`]` {* accessor-declarations *}*
_</pre>

The sample:
{{{
public class C {
    private double[] table;
    public double this[int i] {
        get {
            return table[i];
        }
        protected set {
            table[i] = value;
        }
    }
}
}}}
is equivalent to the following Java program:
{{{
public class C {
    private double[] table;
    @stab.lang.IndexerGet
    public final double getItem(int i) {
        return table[i];
    }
    @stab.lang.IndexerSet
    protected final void setItem(int i, double value) {
        table[i] = value;
    }
}
}}}
